summary: Another kind of spear in Japanese Style
descriptionHtml:
Well, another spear to share with u guys!
Similar to weapon of Honda Tadakatsu
now, equip it to ur cha and experience fighting like a famous Japanese General!

[Installation & Uinstallion]
Use NMM, simple and easy...
[how to get?]
craft it in smithing forge
all u need are steel ingots

at last, it is important to mention that all model we use are made by ourselves, NOT TRANSPLANT from other games, sites or BLABLABLA
THANKS:
CHINA-YYK moral-cat Patrick ZHT858
AND, thank all u guys for ur support!
author: China-YYK Moral cat
